title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Directions & Transportation
body: Directions & Transportation        Regional map showing the location of Craters of the Moon    Â    Getting There  Please do not rely upon digital navigation systems to find your way to Craters of the Moon. Please note that the visitor center & loop drive are located just off of U.S. Highway 20/26/93 and are not accessed via any dirt roads. Physical address for the visitor center is 1266 Craters Loop Road.   Car Craters of the Moon's visitor center is located 18 miles southwest of Arco, Idaho on U.S. Highway 20/26/93. It is 24 miles northeast of Carey, Idaho on U.S. Highway 20/26/93. The physical address is 1266 Craters Loop Road.   Plane The nearest airports are located in Hailey, Idaho (60 miles), Idaho Falls, Idaho (84 miles), and Twin Falls, Idaho (90 miles).
